Reviews.Title: Poor resolution
Reviews.Author: brentr
Reviews.Content: I found that my resolution for the cameras got very grainy with these cables. The 65 ft cables made by CIB are far superior even used 2 of them to make up 100ft and the image is excellent.

Reviews.Title: Longer reach
Reviews.Author: J. Beck
Reviews.Content: I had a spot I needed to mount a camera, and needed a longer cable. This cable arrived and I installed it. It also carries the required video signals from my camera to my camera DVR, and to top it off, even hauls the electricity back to the camera itself to power it.It's more than I hoped for. I would buy this again!

Reviews.Title: night owl extension
Reviews.Author: candot666 "candi"
Reviews.Content: works fine to extend my cameras.  I just wish one could buy it in smaller segments like they have 60 feet and 100 feet but i only needed like 110 feet so have all this extra.

Reviews.Title: Just what I needed
Reviews.Author: Ruso Minnifield "PrinceHappy2"
Reviews.Content: This 100 FT Camera Extension Cable works great.  It allows me to use one cable rather than putting two cable together to get the desired length.

Reviews.Title: I had no idea
Reviews.Author: Giovanny Gonzalez
Reviews.Content: that these cables came with an adapter.  So I spent money that I didn't even have to spend buying adaptors from another place.  It wasn't on the description.  So I super got my moneys worth.  Thanks!  And they have been working excellently for months.Gio

Reviews.Title: Works
Reviews.Author: sean
Reviews.Content: I wasn't sure it would be compatible with my Mace gear but it is.  100 ft is plenty for most jobs but you may be surprised at how quickly it can run out going around corners.

Reviews.Title: Night owl cable.
Reviews.Author: F. OHalloran "luckyme"
Reviews.Content: I bought this as an extra. Caz I purchased the 4 camera w/ DVD set up. Witch I am very happy with. I really needed a 8 set. But I wasn't thinking. So I bought 2 extra cameras so all I have to do is switch the cables in the back. If I ever have to. And I can attach the 60 to this 100 to get the length. And I have had no problems with 160' of viewing. Works great.

Reviews.Title: Just what I needed.
Reviews.Author: M. Meyer
Reviews.Content: if you have a large home you will need this. Maybe more than 2 to extend to those hard to reach areas of the home or business.

Reviews.Title: Camera cable
Reviews.Author: Julie Pospyhalla "Julie"
Reviews.Content: Very durable cable for security cameras we have never had any problems with it at all, it was easy to hook up.

Reviews.Title: every inch counts
Reviews.Author: Alaina J. Bible "akatz22"
Reviews.Content: will need this cable when installing security camera on the back of your home if over 1500sq. Worked out nicely...

Reviews.Title: Perfect
Reviews.Author: Justin
Reviews.Content: There isn't much to say about 100 ft of cable other than it works and was not broken in any way when it arrived. I needed this longer piece when my 60ft cable wouldn't reach from one side of my house to the DVR.

Reviews.Title: 100 ft Camera Extention Cable
Reviews.Author: LEM
Reviews.Content: We ordered the camera then realized we needed this cord.  The order arrived fairly quickly and the cable worked so that's what counts.

Reviews.Title: Security Camera Cable
Reviews.Author: Alf
Reviews.Content: Good product and delivered on time at a good price.  Easy to use.  Make sure you don't have multiple cables too close to each other or they will bleed over.

Reviews.Title: ext cable
Reviews.Author: Bernadette Mitchell "Lady Di"
Reviews.Content: This cable works perfect for adding additional cameras with your night owl system. Fast hookup with BNC Female to Female Coupler.

Reviews.Title: Great price for longer cord.
Reviews.Author: Erik Okerholm "some normal guy....."
Reviews.Content: Will use this for 100 feet and combine 2 of the 60 foot sections to make a 120 foot line for installation of cameras. Great price, super quick delivery. I love love love Amazon Prime!

Reviews.Title: Good buy
Reviews.Author: Darlene
Reviews.Content: This was exactly what I was looking for and the price was great. I would recommend this product to anyone with the night owl system.

Reviews.Title: just what i wanted
Reviews.Author: Heather
Reviews.Content: Purchased these to go with the Poseidon security system we bought from Sears.  The price was much better than I found anywhere else, and the wires are perfect.

Reviews.Title: Video & Power Cable extension - Night Owl Security
Reviews.Author: Steve
Reviews.Content: This Night Owl Security extension cable works perfect, it's exactly what I needed to keep an eye on my shop at all times, I was surprised that there was no lossof quality in the signal due to the increased length.It is perfect!

Reviews.Title: Superior Cable
Reviews.Author: Christine E. Hall
Reviews.Content: There was not enough cable to install the fourth camera of the set.  This cable is the same in every way to the shorter cable.  No distortion or lag in feed to the monitor. I would recommend this to anyone who needs the additional cable.

Reviews.Title: Night owl cable
Reviews.Author: SY "SY"
Reviews.Content: As ordered. Best price and quick delivery. Product performs as described and is comparable with the Night Owl surveillance system. BTW, The system is hooked up and I am very pleased.

Reviews.Title: Too weak to work product
Reviews.Author: William Blake
Reviews.Content: You can not image how thin this cable is. Its appearance seems very delicate but it is too weaker to use. Don't plan on letting the cable work. This CABLE is so bad  will break as soon as you take it out of the package. Do not buyer this poor quality very thinner cable

ProductInfo.Features: Night Owl CAB-100 BNC Extension Cable
ProductInfo.Name: Night Owl 100FT CAMERA EXTENSION CABLE PERP BLACK POWER/VIDEO CABLE
